00017         Exception::Exception(const char* msg, int code)
00018                 : m_code(code)
00019                 , m_nested(0)
00020         {
00021                 m_msg = new char[strlen(msg) + 1];
00022                 strcpy(m_msg, msg);
00023         }
00024 
00026 
00027         Exception::Exception(const char* msg, const char* arg, int code)
00028                 : m_code(code)
00029                 , m_nested(0)
00030         {
00031                 size_t ms = strlen(msg);
00032                 size_t s = ms + strlen(arg) + 2;
00033 
00034                 m_msg = new char[s];
00035 
00036                 strcpy(m_msg, msg);
00037                 m_msg[ms] = ' ';
00038 
00039                 strcpy(m_msg + ms + 1, arg);
00040         }
00041 
00043 
00044         Exception::Exception(const char* msg, const Exception& nested, int code)
00045                 : m_code(code)
00046                 , m_nested(nested.clone())
00047         {
00048                 m_msg = new char[strlen(msg) + 1];
00049                 strcpy(m_msg, msg);
00050         }
00051 
00053 
00054         Exception::Exception(const Exception& other)
00055                 : m_code(other.m_code)
00056                 , m_nested(other.m_nested ? other.m_nested->clone() : 0)
00057         {
00058                 m_msg = new char[strlen(other.m_msg) + 1];
00059                 strcpy(m_msg, other.m_msg);
00060         }
00061 
00063 
00064         Exception::~Exception() throw()
00065         {
00066                 if(m_nested)
00067                         m_nested->release();
00068                 delete[] m_msg;
00069         }
00070 
00072 
00073         Exception& Exception::operator = (const Exception& exc)
00074         {
00075                 if(&exc == this)
00076                         return *this;
00077 
00078                 if(m_nested)
00079                 {
00080                         m_nested->release();
00081                         m_nested = 0;
00082                 }
00083                 delete[] m_msg;
00084 
00085                 size_t s = strlen(exc.m_msg);
00086                 m_msg = new char[s + 1];
00087                 strcpy(m_msg, exc.m_msg);
00088 
00089                 if(exc.m_nested)
00090                         m_nested = exc.m_nested->clone();
00091                 return *this;
00092         }
00093

00096         const char* Exception::className() const throw()
00097         {
00098                 return "Exception";
00099         }
00100 
00102 
00103         const char* Exception::what() const throw()
00104         {
00105                 return m_msg;
00106         }

00110         Exception* Exception::clone() const
00111         {
00112                 return new Exception(*this);
00113         }

00117         void Exception::release()
00118         {
00119                 delete this;
00120         }
00121 
00123 
00124         void Exception::rethrow() const
00125         {
00126                 throw *this;
00127         }
